channel.title: Help plz
channel.description:
so i have my server its working etc ppl playing on it but sometimes people come in it with like injected 1-20 and they were all spamming fucking sad but if i ipban 1 how they not get banned all ?
and today it happend that there was 88 players in the server i check the player list and like 70 where called null why is that and how can i stop that ?
hope someone can help me :D
jeffrey
